original_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I also will ask you one thing, which if ye tell me, I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 나도 한 말을 너희에게 물으리니 너희가 대답하면 나도 무슨 권위로 이런 일을 하는지 이르리라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them
I also will ask you one thing
I in like wise will tell you
by what authority I do these things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이런 일을 하는 권세가 무엇인지를
